student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hi there! Let's talk about parks. Have you been to any parks lately?
Yes, I went to a park last weekend.
Great! Which park did you go to?
I mean, what is the name of the park you visited?
Oh, I went to Central Park.
Nice! I've been to Central Park too. How was it?
It was beautiful. I enjoyed the trees and the lake.
That sounds wonderful! Central Park is indeed a special place. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
